phrases: Hats and Underwear go on your Head!?
AM 2:00 - Night Before the Sports Meet
What are you doing out here?
Out for a late night stroll, huh?
Well, you can tell me all about why you are skulking
around a middle school down at the station!
N-No, I am just watching over my daughter!
She does not look anything like him...
Always judging me on how I look...
How long have you been here, daddy?
You cannot go out on your own this late at night!
I-I am sorry...but tomorrow's the sports meet,
I was so excited I could not sit still!
I wanted to do a final rehearsal.
We are starting with the opening ceremony?
A-As athletes we pledge to be good sportsmen
and to compete fairly and honestly!
I have to do that too?
May today be a lucky day...
You are in the obstacle course, the tug-o-war, the piggyback battle...
Is this supposed to be a balance beam?
I got to hold the tape too?
And I am the anchor for the relay race!
Oh no, I have got to hold up the tape!
I will not let my daughter beat me!
She is still a little girl.
The day of the sports meet
The piggyback battle...what a stupid event.
Let us grab everyone else's hats!
No...we should keep observing and wait for the crowd to thin out...
I want to get in a chicken fight!
Do not move without warning me!
The ground's so...the ground's so far down!
Positioning self in enemy blind spot...
They are staying away'cuz they think they will be cursed.
I feel like someone is calling me...
You are the noisiest horsey ever.
We are not even trying to help, either.
I was aiming for your hat!
Look at Micchan, she is having a ball.
She is not even going for the hats, she is just trying to inflict pain!
Mitsuba's inhumanly cruel to allies and enemies alike.
Micchan, please stop treating my eyebrows like a steering wheel!
Sugisaki-san and Miyawhatever-san said you are a disgusting cow, Micchan.
And I never said a word about her!
Look at all the hats I have got!
I am leading our team to certain victory.
Aww, you guys do not even have a single one?
Bow to me in gratitude for winning!
And you were so worked up, too.
Guess you just have bad luck, Futaba!
Stuck with our lazy sister Hitoha and two lame horses!
I want enemy hats, lots and lots
We are on the same team!
She can only see the hats now...
The sports meet is like an aphrodisiac to her, making her mad with desire.
Stop your stupid rambling and get her under control!
Get away from me, this is pointless!
So high...going to fall, going to die...
I am dead, my life is ending-
No, I came to watch my daughters!
That is what they all say.
I just want to see them trying their best!
You are trapped Mitsuba, hand over the caps!
You thought I would let you losers steal my glory?
You do not have boobs, Micchan.
Why does this always happen to me?!
Because you are dirty and dishonorable.
Look, the hats are the only way to stop Futaba.
Even a couple would do it...
I got them fair and square.
That is all of them, you cheater!
See, all you had to do was try!
Spit them back up this instant!
Yabe-sensei collapsed with a fever during class.
Yabecchi's lessons are boring anyway, I do not mind having study hall every now and then.
I doubt it is anything big, but everyone gets noisy during study hall, so I am out.
I am still writing sutras on Yabecchi's body.
With the way he collapsed so suddenly,
there is no doubt in my mind he is in the clutches of some malicious spirit!
There is been a lot of weird stuff going down in the room, you know?
It is cursed, I know it!
It is not your fault, Youngest-san.
Maybe you tend to draw spirits to you as a result of your work,
but anyways, what is your opinion as a beautiful genius prodigy exorcist?
I think he is wiped out.
His soul's been swiped out, eh?
What kind of ceremony is she prepping?
How are we supposed to exorcise the demon without covering his WHOLE body in sutras?
Youngest-san, help me flip him over.
I am going back to class.
Yabecchi will die if we do not do anything!
He really COULD die if he falls on his head.
Another ploy by the demon ghost!
Do not blame your screw-ups on ghosts.
What a high fever...he must be sick.
It needs to be washable, right?
I have learned from my previous mistakes!
Right, we cannot let anyone interfere!
Have you been here the whole time?
She is being awfully considerate for once...
Okay, you have got Yabecchi's underwear, just like you wanted!
Thinks they are for the exorcism
Why did you strip me naked?!
What are you trying to do?!
And why do you want my boxers?!
Take my underwear off this instant!
Look at my new Pianissimo pencil case.
My mom got it for me.
It is a limited edition, you cannot get them anywhere anymore.
And what exactly is up with YOUR case, Mitsuba?
It is made of gym clothes!
Oh, that is the pencil case I made from my dogi.
You made three, did not you Futaba-chan?
I ruined mine a while ago.
You are okay in my book.
Yeah, I would be grateful too.
I will throw it out right now!
Bah, just because something is expensive does not make it better!
You are just a filthy peasant but you drive me nuts!
It is a text from my mom.
Wow, that is the latest model phone is not it Sugi-chan?
It is even got video and audio streaming through 1-Seg!
And it is got like a 20 megapixel camera, too.
Of course, a peasant like Mitsuba-san would not care about that, I am sure.
If I am not supposed to care then do not wave it in my face.
Hey, you have got lots of pictures of Micchan on here.
Sugi-chan must really like you Micchan!
Mitsuba can drop dead for all I care!
At this rate I AM going to end up being humiliated!
Still keeping up the holier-than-thou act?
Why do not you go back to kindergarten?
What do you all think of this shocking truth?
Mitsuba's position in class will drop to the bottom!
All the power and respect I have worked so hard for, gone!
How can I be so far behind...
I wear cute, sexy adult panties!
Well, that is news to me.
But you know what they say, seeing is believing.
I was winning, I was winning!
But I cannot prove it...damn it!
Hey everyone, Sugisaki says she is going to show us all her fantastic underwear!
Let us see what you have got.
But I will only show Mitsuba!
I will only show my panties to Mitsuba!
Who wants to look at your big butt granny panties?
WHY do you want me to see them?
Say it so everyone can hear you.
Why are they making US do the preview, Sugisaki?
We do not really interact much, huh?
I noticed you are both into panties!
Shout out your shared love for panties for all the world to hear!
Episode 7 I Cannot Help Being in Love!
